# Recap

## Recap

- Adopting package development techniques is good for:

    - future-self
    - the community (reproducibility etc.)

- Don't be afraid to use the *wizards*, they are here to help!

    - `devtools`
    - `usethis`
    - `roxygen2`

## The basic `R` package directory tree

\scriptsize
```
.
|--- DESCRIPTION
|--- NAMESPACE
|--- mypackage.Rproj
|--- R
|    |--- myfunction.R
|    |--- myotherfunction.R
|--- man
|    |--- myfunction.Rd
|    |--- myotherfunction.Rd
```

## Package structure after fluffing it up

\scriptsize
```
.
|--- DESCRIPTION
|--- NAMESPACE
|--- mypackage.Rproj
|--- R
|    |--- myfunction.R
|    |--- myotherfunction.R
|--- man
|    |--- myfunction.Rd
|    |--- myotherfunction.Rd
|--- README.md
|--- LICENSE
|--- LICENSE.md
|--- INST
|    |--- CITATION
```
